Origin Story / Corporate Mythology

HOW IT STARTED

It was 2018. Bash Sterling was on his third all-inclusive Sandals honeymoon (second wife, first refund attempt) when he made eye contact with a concierge named Gerald across a rain-soaked poolside buffet. Gerald did not blink. Gerald did not look away. Gerald simply materialized a towel, a complimentary rum punch, and a handwritten apology card — in that order, in under nine seconds.

Bash wept. Not because of the service. Because of the commitment.

Three duty-free Scotches later, on a napkin that would later be laminated, Bash wrote: "What if every guest interaction felt like a beautiful hostage negotiation?"

I joined six months later. I'd spent eleven years mediating disputes between airport hotel housekeeping staff and guests who believed the Do Not Disturb sign was a suggestion. I was tired. I was good at it. Bash said, "Agnes, I need someone who can smile and mean it as a threat." I said, "When do I start?"

He disappeared into a Tibetan monastery in 2021. Left me the company, a chihuahua named Liability, and a Post-It that said "maintain the vision." I have.

Service Tiers / Liability Waivers Available Upon Request

WHAT WE DO TO YOUR HOTEL

Standard Assertive Consulting Package Popular

A 12-week embedded programme in which our consultants observe, document, and systematically reconstruct your front-desk interactions. We will teach your staff to remember every guest's name, preferred pillow firmness, and the look in their eyes when they checked in. Includes laminated quick-reference cards and one (1) follow-up debrief per quarter.

Intensity Level

Verbal Judo Seminars Advanced

Two-day intensive workshops where your concierge team learns the ancient art of redirecting guest rage into guest loyalty using nothing but tone modulation, strategic pauses, and the phrase "I completely understand." Participants will leave either transformed or mildly unsettled. Both outcomes are acceptable.

Intensity Level

Conflict De-escalation (Through Escalation) Workshops Extreme

Our flagship programme. The theory is simple: if you escalate your kindness faster than the guest can escalate their complaint, you win. Participants learn to deploy complimentary upgrades, maintain unbroken eye contact for 45+ seconds, and execute the legendary "triple apology with gift basket flanking manoeuvre." Results guaranteed. Definitions of "results" may vary.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

(asked frequently, answered reluctantly)

Technically, yes. Aggressive Hospitality operates within the full boundaries of hospitality law as it is currently understood, which is to say, not particularly well. Our waivers have been reviewed by two solicitors and one very confused barrister. The phrase "duty of care" features prominently in our contracts, though our interpretation of it may differ from yours. We have never been successfully sued. The emphasis is on "successfully."

Bash Sterling is currently on an open-ended sabbatical pursuing personal enlightenment in an undisclosed South Asian location. His last official communication to the company was a postcard reading "The silence here is incredible. Don't call." Management respects his journey. Management would also like its company credit card back.

"Enjoy" is a strong word. Guests experience our methods. Many describe the sensation as "disarming," "surprisingly emotional," and "like being hugged by a corporate policy." Our post-engagement surveys show a 94% satisfaction rate, though 12% of respondents noted they weren't entirely sure what had happened to them. We count this as a win.

Our success rate depends entirely on how you define success. If success means "the guest stopped complaining," we achieve 97%. If success means "the guest left a positive review," 89%. If success means "the guest formed a genuine human connection with your staff that transcended the transactional nature of modern hospitality," we're at a respectable 34%, which is frankly miraculous given the state of things.

CAREERS & CONTACT

HIGHLY ASSERTIVE HOSPITALITY SPECIALIST

Department of Guest Engagement / Field Operations

We are seeking an individual of uncommon resolve to join our embedded consulting teams. The ideal candidate does not flinch, does not whisper, and does not accept "it's fine" as a genuine answer. This is not a role for the faint of heart. It is a role for the aggressively warm.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Unflinching commitment to guest delight, even when the guest is actively hostile
  • Proficiency in the art of the guilt trip (certification preferred, not required)
  • Ability to maintain unbroken eye contact for 45+ seconds without blinking or smiling
  • Experience in hospitality, conflict mediation, or any career involving prolonged emotional endurance
  • Willingness to sign a waiver acknowledging that "aggressive kindness" is a real thing
  • Own a dark blazer. We don't supply them. It's a personal commitment.
